ing: 2 tablespoons chopped almonds, or to taste (optional)
2 tablespoons shredded unsweetened coconut, or to taste (optional)
des: "Here's an easy-to-make recipe for a delicious fudge that's completely raw and vegan. The best part about this recipe is that it is really fast to make and it doesn't necessarily require a food processor or blender. I recommend rolling the balls in cocoa powder."
ins: Mash dates together in a bowl until a paste-like consistency. Add peanut butter; mix well. Stir almonds, coconut, cocoa powder, and salt into date mixture. Roll date mixture into balls.
